block.p: OSTROFF-Frieda. The executive and members of Branch 137 of the Workmen's Circle deeply mourn the passing of our esteemed member and past chairman, Frieda Ostroff, who was one of our founders and longtime activists. Our heartfelt condolences to Harold and the entire family.

OSTROFF-Frieda. The Board of Directors and members of the Van Cortlandt Workmen's Circle Community House deeply mourn the passing of our board member and one of our founders, Frieda Ostroff. Our heartfelt condolences to Harold and the entire family.

OSTROFF-Frieda. The Board of Directors and staff of the Workmen's Circle Home and Geriatric Center mourn the death of Frieda Ostroff, a staunch supporter of the home. We extend our condolences to husband Harold and family. Samuel Byer, President Members of the Board of Directors David Londin, Executive Director Judith Fenster, Asst. Exec. Dir.

OSTROFF-Frieda. The executive and members of Branch 137 of the Workmen's Circle deeply mourn the passing of our esteemed member and past chairman, Frieda Ostroff, who was one of our founders and longtime activists. Our heartfelt condolences to Harold and the entire family.

OSTROFF-Frieda. The Board of Directors and members of the Van Cortlandt Workmen's Circle Community House deeply mourn the passing of our board member and one of our founders, Frieda Ostroff. Our heartfelt condolences to Harold and the entire family.

OSTROFF-Frieda. The Board of Directors and staff of the Workmen's Circle Home and Geriatric Center mourn the death of Frieda Ostroff, a staunch supporter of the home. We extend our condolences to husband Harold and family. Samuel Byer, President Members of the Board of Directors David Londin, Executive Director Judith Fenster, Asst. Exec. Dir.
